title: Is there a way to report Boards moderation? (Player/Person specific)

replies.body:
There are two ways to report issues with the moderation staff. The first way would be to make a post here on the Boards Feedback section, the second would be to come talk to us directly on our [Discord Server.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/qVlculPP-boards-moderation-discord)

Both methods work, however the discord server tends to be faster and easier for both parties involved, as we can talk in real time.
I think i'll go with the former then.

Alright, that works. It is mostly just a matter of preference. The main difference between the two is that you still cannot report individual posters on the Boards Feedback section, as that violates our naming and shaming rule, whereas you can on the discord in a private chat room with a moderator. 

For this matter though (reporting an issue you are having with a Warden/Arbiter/Archivist etc., the boards feedback section is appropriate.

So i can report a specific Moderator by name but i can't report a regular poster?

For example, i can report a person who is a Warden/Arbiter/Archivist etc. by name?
Yes, so long as it is criticism and not harassment. For example, you can point out something you feel is wrong with them or they need to do better on, but you cannot just insult them.

Thanks for clarifying.

I won't go too harsh on you. So don't worry about it.
